title: Close To Home: Great stories begin with local reporting
description: Local reporting is often stigmatized as a numbing procession of planning and zoning meetings, but it can actually be a valuable source of important stories. This tipsheet offers suggestions for finding and reporting on these stories, including looking at government spending, salaries, internal audits, and nonprofits.
